content: Randarts are randomly generated magical items that can appear in the game Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup. They can have a variety of different properties, such as enchantments, brands, and egos, which are randomly selected from a pool of possible attributes. These items can also have unique names and can appear randomly in the dungeon or be gifted by certain gods. In general, randarts are powerful items but can also have negative properties that make them difficult to use.
